review: i like it ahhhh lot

this is pretty much how i experienced cod4 back in the day bought a sequel set in space and played the remake that some veterans would consider botched except this time there was no sequel set in space but i still payed about the same price  that being said i did enjoy this as more of an extra level pack for 12 although i do think that we should get a new game in the series underground 3 maybe
just add soundtrack mods and youre all set
i love the th games this will give you the nostalgia you want but beware you will bounce off of everything and have combos just end by a 2 inch lip they really need to fix the collision on this game
good game if youre new to the series pretty disappointing if you played the originals

not as vibrant as the original games the feeling of 4 is significantly changed with timed runs only some skaters recorded their own voice lines but the ones who didnt are pretty jarring it also feels strange to play a game with a censored soundtrack in the year 2025   might be worth picking up for the nostalgia when it goes on sale but im not having a great time with this game
i mean its a good game but your looking at like 20 hours of gameplay i feel i way over payed for the amount of content you actually get
good game

if you loved the 12 remake and never played 3 and 4  youre probably gonna love this game as well i didnt grow up with thps4 so i wasnt too distraught over the missing features but yes it wouldve been nice if they added the open world career mode
play da original 4 tho please god
love the new levels

its jank as all hell and the character customisation is 11 with 12 remakes which is meh id like more options akin to thug12s customisation but its really fun to have a new tony hawk game in 2025 playing online with a friend was far easier this time and took literally one invite also crossplay is a welcome touch
very good missing the career mode for thps4  but still fun
never played the originals but this was fun the music easily my favorite part just nonstop bangers gameplay feels smooth combos are satisfying its just pure fun glad i gave it a shot 1010 p
better and worse than the og versions
7 whole hawks a winner

despite the controversy surrounding the changes this is more tony hawks pro skater and i love it i prefer the structure of 13 but feel for those who wanted a faithful recreation of 4 i think it was probably a misstep to modify it
nostalgic vibe check no zebrahead tho
i enjoyed 1  2 more but if you loved that one this is basically a must have if 1  2 is a 910 then 3  4 is an 8510 wont bother saying more as its all been said already shred on

if you bought this like i did to play thps4 and immediately get disappointed with the timer on screen and just another rehashed shell of 1 2 3 i hope you get a refund for this because the og pro skater 4 was a million times better than this green flaming dumpster fire even if you preordered it in advance i hope you get a refund im gonna try and get one right now in all honesty im fed up with these money grabbers trying to rebound on nostalgia
the gameplay loop is fun the levels are awesome and the soundtrack rips

custom character design is horrendous everyone looks ugly and generic i have no inspiration to collect any of the clothing etc because they arent usable on the preset characters and you cant make your character look any less ugly with the purchasable elements thats the biggest disappointment in this game for me even the preset character have a certain level of ugliness to them for a modern game this could have been done so much better  sure buy it but maybe on a steam sale
tony hawk man

my main disappointment is the lack of the combo goals in thps4 because those were so fun  challenging when i was youngerbut overall this is an amazing remake  super fun feels great  fairly quickeasy to beat overall for experienced players but still worth it  online mode is niceyou just join up and the gameplay keeps rolling within minimal time between challenges  it was odd at first because its not a typical lobby with the loading and voting and suchreally cool
hail skatan
pretty good

long time fan of the series  this is a good game thps 4 doesnt have the full career but i still found the levels to all be enjoyable to play through would definitely recommend if you enjoy this series
while i do miss some maps and songs overall i am having a lot of fun with this game

1010 recommend been a thps player from thps on ps1 to the ps2 demo with the paris to thps3 on ps2 thps4 on gamecube lol and so on this is a fantastic blend of updated gameplay and graphics with the tried and tested formula its a dream that this franchise is still going
not as good as the originals but a fun nostalgia hit glad to see new skaters in the lineup too

its still a fun game despite the changes done to the goal system that was in place in thps4 no ollie the magic bum and some of the stages that were not competitions are now such bit of an annoyance but we still get some of the destruction done by some goals soo  i would still recommend it anyway because its still a damn good game
new tony slaps hard gang
definitely worth trying a lot of nicely designed levels and pretty fun but fast online games makes me think thug2 could be possible on unreal engine lol
this rocks
tony hawk

great remake its amazing to see my favourite franchise in high quality and have no regrets paying the extra money for preorder deluxe edition despite the negative talks about removing funny details such as the peeing man and neversoft girls those werent what made the games enjoyable it was chaining cool tricks and having fun tony hawks pro skater will always be a great game to me no matter whats changed surely thug 12 remake next
